dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: See that sheathing on the suspension? Eaten away.  Same thing with the pumps on the base air purifiers.  The algae out here just isn't good on these new plastics.

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: We haven't used Big Bertha since we relocated the generator module. That was four months ago.  I can't ask for them to keep bringing spares in on the shuttle, it's already costing too much as it is.

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: I just... wanted to be put on my own for a while.  Clear my head.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: Didn't feel like whoopin' it up with the rest of us blue collars, huh?

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: Not too much of the socializing type, then?

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: No, not really.  More sort of the  'claustrophobic' type.

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: I'm serious.  That's why I switched from orbiting to planetary installations.

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: Uh-huh.  Used to get it pretty bad.  I'd wake up in a cold sweat and want to claw open a vacuum hatch.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: How long you been out here for now, anyway?  Three months?

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: Just curious.  There's a lot of talk goes around.

characters.name: Hiroko
characters.persona: Hiroko is a female character in the movie Alien Vs. Predator. She is a survivor of the attack on the research vessel, the Nostromo. She is the sole remaining member of the crew, and is the ship's computer expert. Hiroko is the only character in the movie who speaks Japanese. Her persona in the movie is that of a resourceful and determined survivor.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: Nothing.  With the satellite down, we can't transmit over the mountain range. He's most likely sitting there wondering why he can't raise us.

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: First light, we'll take a chopper out there and tell them to head back.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: 'We'?  You wanna fly out there with me?

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: Sure.  Do me good to stretch my legs.

characters.name: Hiroko
characters.persona: Hiroko is a female character in the movie Alien Vs. Predator. She is a survivor of the attack on the research vessel, the Nostromo. She is the sole remaining member of the crew, and is the ship's computer expert. Hiroko is the only character in the movie who speaks Japanese. characters.name: Kamen
characters.persona: Kamen is one of the crew of the Nostromo who are attacked by the Alien and Predator. He is the engineer of the ship and is killed in the attack.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: Don't worry about it.  If the Network goes by the book, like everyone figures they will, a Marine gunboat from Powell'll drop-by for a look- see in four-or-five days.  They can go poke around out there and find whatever it was hit us.  All we've gotta do is sit tight.

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: Do you think Ackland'll sit tight?

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: There'd have to be a helluva good reason for him not to.

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: I'm going to need you to co-sign the report.  Until we come up with something, this'll be treated as first degree murder.

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: When we get the link back, and I send this in, I.C.C.'ll throw a fit.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: Ah, don't worry about I.C.C.  They're the least of your problems right now.

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: Again?  How long before we start noticing the difference?

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: Ackland?  I don't know him well enough to say.  If we were back on Earth we could run him though an Aldhoven test and find out for sure. There's not much we can do out here.

characters.name: Hiroko
characters.persona: Hiroko is a female character in the movie Alien Vs. Predator. She is a survivor of the attack on the research vessel, the Nostromo. She is the sole remaining member of the crew, and is the ship's computer expert. Hiroko is the only character in the movie who speaks Japanese. characters.name: Kamen
characters.persona: Kamen is one of the crew of the Nostromo who are attacked by the Alien and Predator. He is the engineer of the ship and is killed in the attack.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: Cornering it shouldn't be a problem.  Each part of this station is basically a self-sufficient deep-space transport module running off external couplers.  If we disconnect them and seal off every section, we've got a ceiling of about thirty-six hours on internal power.  That should give us ample time to find it.

dialogue.name: Hiroko
dialogue.line: Alright.  Pull some trackers and headsets out of stores, and I'll sign a release for the weapons.  Cassie, organise a team roster and put it on the board.

characters.name: Hiroko
characters.persona: Hiroko is a female character in the movie Alien Vs. Predator. She is a survivor of the attack on the research vessel, the Nostromo. characters.persona: Kamen is one of the crew of the Nostromo who are attacked by the Alien and Predator. He is the engineer of the ship and is killed in the attack.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: What do I think?  I think if those Marines from Powell don't shift their butts getting here, we're gonna get caught up to our necks in the middle of something we shouldn't.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: They...they snapped my legs to fit... fit me in here.  I don't...remember what happened next.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: I can... feel it moving around inside me. You've got to kill me.

characters.name: Parsons
characters.persona: Parsons are a team of mercenaries hired by the Weyland-Yutani Corporation to help protect their research vessel from the Alien species in the movie 'Alien Vs. Predator'. They are a militaristic team and are very aggressive.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: Camped out by the navi-beacon out on Linson's Range.  They're making their own way back tomorrow.

dialogue.name: Parsons
dialogue.line: Today's party's finished their sweep, the relief team's out there now. Everybody else is either asleep or running shift in the auto-shop.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: You should hit the sack, too.

dialogue.name: Parsons
dialogue.line: Nah, I'll stick it out for another hour or so.

dialogue.name: Kamen
dialogue.line: Give me a yell is something happens.
